prompt: A comprehensive analysis of cryptocurrency projects for investment decision-making

sections.title: Executive Summary
sections.prompt: Provide a concise overview of the project's key differentiators and investment potential. Highlight the most critical insights without repeating detailed metrics covered in other sections. Focus on forward-looking implications and strategic positioning.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.prompt: Introduce the project's core value proposition and strategic goals. Provide context on the project's background and market positioning without delving into detailed metrics or analysis covered in later sections.

sections.title: Tokenomics and Distribution
sections.prompt: Analyze the token's economic model and distribution strategy. Focus on token utility, distribution fairness, and potential market impact. Avoid repeating general market metrics covered in the Market Analysis section.

sections.title: Market Analysis
sections.prompt: Conduct a detailed analysis of market dynamics and competitive positioning. Focus on trading patterns, liquidity, and market trends without repeating basic metrics from earlier sections.

sections.title: Technical Analysis
sections.prompt: Evaluate the project's technical architecture and innovations. Focus on scalability, security, and technical advantages without overlapping with governance or market analysis.

sections.title: Developer Tools and User Experience
sections.prompt: Assess the developer ecosystem and user experience. Highlight available tools, documentation quality, and user engagement without repeating technical details covered in other sections.

sections.title: Security
sections.prompt: Provide a comprehensive security assessment focusing on audit findings and risk management. Avoid repeating technical details already covered in the Technical Analysis section.

sections.title: Liquidity and Adoption Metrics
sections.prompt: Analyze adoption and liquidity metrics, focusing on user growth and market integration. Avoid repeating basic market metrics covered earlier.

sections.title: Governance and Community
sections.prompt: Evaluate governance structures and community engagement. Focus on decision-making processes and community growth without overlapping with tokenomics or technical analysis.

sections.title: Ecosystem and Partnerships
sections.prompt: Analyze strategic partnerships and ecosystem development. Focus on integration depth and mutual value creation without repeating adoption metrics covered in earlier sections.

sections.title: Risks and Opportunities
sections.prompt: Provide a balanced analysis of risks and opportunities, focusing on regulatory challenges and growth catalysts. Avoid repeating risks mentioned in previous sections.

sections.title: Team and Development Activity
sections.prompt: Evaluate team capabilities and development momentum. Focus on team experience and roadmap execution without overlapping with technical analysis.

sections.title: Conclusion
sections.prompt: Synthesize key investment considerations and provide actionable insights. Focus on the primary investment thesis and growth opportunities without introducing new information.

price_history_chart.title: 60-Day Price Trend
price_history_chart.description_template: The chart shows the price movement of {project_name} over the past 60 days, illustrating {trend_description}.

volume_chart.title: 30-Day Trading Volume
volume_chart.description_template: Trading volume for {project_name} over the past 30 days shows {volume_description}.

tvl_chart.title: Total Value Locked (TVL) Trend
tvl_chart.description_template: The Total Value Locked (TVL) in {project_name} over the past 60 days demonstrates {tvl_description}.

key_metrics_table.title: Key Metrics
key_metrics_table.description_template: Current key metrics for {project_name} as of {timestamp}.

basic_metrics_table.title: Basic Information
basic_metrics_table.description_template: Basic market information for {project_name} as of {timestamp}.

token_distribution_pie.title: Token Distribution
token_distribution_pie.description_template: Distribution of {project_name} tokens among different stakeholders.

developer_tools_table.title: Developer Tools
developer_tools_table.description_template: Available tools and resources for developers working with {project_name}.

user_experience_metrics.title: User Experience Metrics
user_experience_metrics.description_template: Key metrics indicating the user experience of {project_name}.

security_audits_table.title: Security Audits
security_audits_table.description_template: Summary of security audits conducted on {project_name}.

competitor_comparison_chart.title: Competitive Comparison
competitor_comparison_chart.description_template: This chart compares {project_name} with similar projects in terms of {metrics_description}.

liquidity_trends_chart.title: 30-Day Liquidity Trends
liquidity_trends_chart.description_template: Liquidity trends for {project_name} over the past 30 days show {liquidity_description}.

team_metrics_table.title: Team and Development Metrics
team_metrics_table.description_template: Key details about the {project_name} team and development efforts.

key_takeaways_table.title: Key Takeaways
key_takeaways_table.description_template: Summary of key findings and recommendations for {project_name}.
